title: instrumentation_policies
content: # `prefect.server.orchestration.instrumentation_policies` Orchestration rules related to instrumenting the orchestration engine for Prefect Observability ## Classes ### `InstrumentFlowRunStateTransitions` When a Flow Run changes states, fire a Prefect Event for the state change **Methods:** #### `after_transition` ```python theme={null} after_transition(self, context: OrchestrationContext[orm_models.FlowRun, core.FlowRunPolicy]) -> None ```
